data.actual_result: You are able to interact with the screen behind the loading animation. This happens even with server creation screen.
data.expected_result: You shouldn't be able to interact with the screen behind.
data.short_description: You can interact with the screen behind in the share screen while it's loading.
data.steps_to_repro: - Share an image from your gallery to Discord. - In the share screen, select any channel and hit send. - While the loading animation plays, try to interact with the screen behind the animation.
